sn9.8:1.1: Ekam samayam annataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati annatarasmim vanasande.
sn9.8:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu annatarasmim kule ativelam ajjhogalhappatto viharati.
sn9.8:1.3: Atha kho ya tasmim vanasande adhivattha devata tassa bhikkhuno anukampika atthakama tam bhikkhum samvejetukama ya tasmim kule kulagharani, tassa vannam abhinimminitva yena so bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum gathaya ajjhabhasi:
